author: Joseph Guzman
title: WHO: US could be the next epicenter of the global coronavirus pandemic - The Hill
description: WHO: US could be the next epicenter of the global coronavirus pandemic The Hill United States could become coronavirus epicenter: WHO Reuters U.S. could become 'coronavirus epicenter', U.K. locks down AOL Coronavirus: US may become epicenter of COVID-19 pande…
content:
A World Health Organization (WHO) official says the United States has the potential to become the new epicenter of the coronavirus crisis as a large acceleration of infections is occurring in the nation. 
We are now seeing a very large acceleration in cases … [+2221 chars]
